code: import React from"react";import{Card}from"react-bootstrap";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import PopoverItem from"../Profile/popover-item";import{ArrowRight}from"../../layouts/icons";import{BadgeItem,RequestBtn,StatusBadge}from"./utilities/event-builder";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function EventItemCard(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-card_dash",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex",id:"card_header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:props.eventData.gravatarImage,className:"userProf-img me-2",id:"card-img",alt:"Img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PopoverItem,{data:props.eventData.userName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"me-auto",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"card-timestamp text-muted align-self-center ms-1",children:[props.eventData.humanTimeDiffCreatedAt," ago"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StatusBadge,{joinedStatus:props.eventData.joinedStatus}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RequestBtn,{JoinEvent:props.eventData,joinedStatus:props.eventData.joinedStatus,btnStyleFull:false})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"event-brief mt-1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:[props.eventData.title," "]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-muted content_sm1",dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:props.eventData.details}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BadgeItem,{content:props.eventData.timeToEvent,eventStatus:props.eventData.eventStatus})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Footer,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/event/".concat(props.eventData.id),children:["Details ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArrowRight,{})]})})]})]});}export default EventItemCard;
